```{r}
library(foreign)
library(tidyverse)
library(e1071)
sesame <- read.dta("sesame.dta")
sesame <- sesame %>%
  mutate(bodyDiff = postbody - prebody,
         letDiff = postlet - prelet,
         formDiff = postform - preform,
         numbDiff = postnumb - prenumb,
         relatDiff = postrelat - prerelat,
         clasfDiff = postclasf - preclasf)
```
